duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform general maintenance tasks for the resort and resort grounds, including repairing walkways, retaining walls, and painting exterior buildings.
Complete assigned work orders and assist in the maintenance and repairs of all areas of the property.
Help with removing snow in the winter months.
Assist other engineering personnel with routine repairs and preventive maintenance.
Respond earnestly to guest requests to ensure their personal comfort.
Monitor and maintain cleanliness, sanitation, and organization of assigned work areas.
Prepare for daily work assignments, review priorities, and handle special projects with enthusiasm.
Maintain appropriate time management and uphold the highest standards for proper use of all equipment.
Ensure the safety and security of the property, guests, and fellow associates.
